name: Shoukang SRPG Demo (RMMV)
description:
I am happy to release this demo project that illustrates the usage of my SRPG plugins.

With this demo project, you will get to know how to use my plugins and realize all the features in my demo game. You can refer to this project to create your own game!

You can play my demo game here:

 https://shoukanghong.github.io/Shoukang_SRPG_plugin/ShoukangSRPGDemo

Get my plugins here:

https://github.com/ShoukangHong/Shoukang_SRPG_plugin

This demo project inherits SRPG MV demo 1.32Q (Link: https://ryanbram.itch.io/srpg-engine-demo-v132q). All the features described there are reserved. I highly recommend you try the 1.32Q demo if you haven't!

Highlights in this demo:

  • Battle preparation phase.
  • Actor interaction commands. unlock, talk, wrap, and more.
  • New AoE battle system.
  • Multiple AI move modes and pathfinding that support terrain effects.
  • Aura skills and aura effects tiles.
  • The attack range now indicates the AoE range.
  • Summon skills and infinite reinforcement.
  • Agi attack control.
  • Multiple pages in SRPG status window.
  • Terrain effect window.
  • The battle result will automatically close in enemy and auto actor phase.
